column3: I think @amitiuttarwar is already working on removing these as a follow-up to #15159.
I wanted to get this in to 0.18.0 without a backport and I haven't seen a follow-up in the last two weeks. Though, happy to close my pull if someone want to take this over.

I've been working on it & was close to putting up a PR, but its ok :) My changes are pretty similar. I can contribute an additional change to the `interface_rest` test to remove -txindex by updating to search for a mempool transaction.
Please open you pull request with the changes. I am happy to provide feedback on those.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->
